prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with vibrant orange and white colors featuring striking fins.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a fish but has unique horn-like structures on its head.
Design a Pokemon that is known for its swimming abilities and has a muscular body.
Imagine a legendary water creature that dominates aquatic battles with its powerful moves.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in both freshwater and saltwater environments.
I want to see a Pokemon with a streamlined body shape and vivid colors, suitable for fast swimming.
Make a Pokemon that has a playful yet competitive personality, often found in deep waters.
